portfolio.title: Mobile and Web App for Ride Booking
portfolio.description: Developed a comprehensive solution for ride, logistics booking, and hiring drivers using React.js and React Native. Designed and implemented a seamless user experience for booking taxis, bike taxis, and professional drivers, enhancing accessibility and convenience. Developed visualizations to present data insights effectively, ensuring a user-friendly interface and smooth functionality. Implementing real-time communication features using Socket.io for live updates.Utilized technologies including React.js, React Native, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Git, Redux, RESTful APIs, Bootstrap, and Websocket for real-time communication with Socket.IO.

portfolio.title: Industrial Dashboard for Role-Based Access Control
portfolio.description: Developing a RBAC dashboard for industrial data management using Blazor Server. Working on front-end development, designing and implementing interactive data visualizations and user interface. Utilizing Blazor Server for server-side logic and dynamic content generation, ensuring seamless integration with the front-end. Implementing real-time communication features using SignalR for live updates. Integrating role-based access control features. Utilizing technologies including Blazor Server, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C#, SignalR, DataTables, Chart.js, jQuery, Bootstrap, SQL, Advantage database server.

testimonial.description: Abdul Jabbar has shown exceptional dedication and hard work in completing projects on time, often working late into the night. His commitment to timely delivery and going the extra mile has been appraised by both his team lead and manager.

Abdul Jabbar's dedication and hard work have been recognized by his team lead and manager. He has consistently shown commitment to delivering high-quality work, often going above and beyond expectations.
